verses.name: Job 31:1
verses.text: I made a covenant with mine eyes; why then should I think upon a maid?

verses.name: Job 31:2
verses.text: For what portion of God is there from above? and what inheritance of the Almighty from on high?

verses.name: Job 31:3
verses.text: Is not destruction to the wicked? and a strange punishment to the workers of iniquity?

verses.name: Job 31:4
verses.text: Doth not he see my ways, and count all my steps?

verses.name: Job 31:5
verses.text: If I have walked with vanity, or if my foot hath hasted to deceit;

verses.name: Job 31:6
verses.text: Let me be weighed in an even balance, that God may know mine integrity.
